revised_title: Deciphering an Ancient Etruscan Inscription on a Denarius Coin
tldr: The author examines a denarius coin with an Etruscan inscription and attempts to interpret its meaning. They suggest that the inscription may belong to an Italian commander named L. Voponius, providing new insights into the history of the Veturian and Luponian families during the Social War.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Numismatics
